statements: DELETE FROM viewer_engagement_metrics WHERE video_id = 'aabbccdd-1234-5678-90ab-cdef01234567' AND engagement_score < 5.0;
DELETE FROM EngagementMetrics WHERE viewer_id = 100 AND time_spent_minutes > 30;
DELETE FROM ViewerDetails WHERE full_name = 'John Doe' AND email = 'john.doe@example.com';
DELETE FROM engagement_metrics WHERE viewer_id = 3 AND video_id = 5;
DELETE FROM viewers WHERE viewer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM ViewerEngagementMetrics WHERE viewer_id = 123 AND video_id = 456
DELETE FROM Ratings WHERE video_id = 10 AND viewer_id = 50;
